action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

term.name: Housing for the elderly and disabled

bill.summary:
Rural Housing Preservation Act of 2018
This bill authorizes rental assistance to low-income tenants of certain multifamily public housing in rural areas and otherwise revises provisions related to low-income housing.
